kv3.10:3.1: Nanu asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaroti?
kv3.10:3.3: Atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlanti?
kv3.10:4.2: Hañci asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.3: “atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan”ti.
kv3.10:4.6: ‘asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.7: ‘atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:5.2: “atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan”ti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.5: “vattabbe kho ‘asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.6: ‘atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:6.1: Atthi manussesu saṁvaro, atthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:6.3: Atthi devesu saṁvaro, atthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:7.1: Atthi devesu saṁvaro, natthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:7.3: Atthi manussesu saṁvaro, natthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:12.1: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:12.3: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:13.1: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:13.3: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:14.1: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:14.3: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:15.1: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:15.3: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:16.3: Sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinoti?
